overview: Lush, vibrant, gorgeous, sweltering...and the locations were pretty good, too! The trend of Brazilian models becoming wildly popular in gay adult videos didn't explode until the Eighties, when former Falcon Studios model-turned-photographer Kristen Bjorn got behind the camera lens and with his first feature, CARNIVAL IN RIO, firmly established himself and his company, Sarava Productions, as entities to watch in the gay adult industry.
title: Carnaval in Rio
